Name: Chains of Time
About the game: SUMMARY This is 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Last Heroes and Fantasy Heroes. Rollo is a street urchin, unaware of his own origins, he was raised by the streets and survives with the aid of his bravery and boldness. Alongside his best friends, who also oppose the current tyrannical regime, he is always on the lookout for a good score. Upon finding a mysterious old ring, things start to unravel for him when he finds out about his past, his birthplace and the consequences that entails. Rollo will have to become much more than a street urchin and care for the survival of all people, instead of only his own. FEATURES Chains of Time is a story of friendship, bravery and overcoming the odds. It touches deep in universal matters that are pertinent to all human experience. The story is paced in an adventurous manner, embark on it and feel yourself going through it. The world of Chains of Time has secrents and hidden locations to be found, on the course of your main mission you will come upon unexpected surprises. Take full advantage of a Quest Journal to keep track of all your objectives. Chains of Time offfers mouse support to those who prefer to play with it. Enjoy this adventure for over 10 to 15 hours.
